Class dominoes.CubbyHole

Class dominoes.CubbyHole 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----dominoes.CubbyHole
public class CubbyHole
extends Object
This class implements a drop box or cubby hole that threads can use to communicate data to one another.

CubbyHole()

get()
This attempts to get data from the cubby hole.
put(Object)
This puts data into the cubby hole, wiping out whatever might have already been in the cubby hole, even if it was not retrieved.

CubbyHole 
  public CubbyHole()

get 
  public synchronized Object get()
This attempts to get data from the cubby hole. It will block if there is no data available in the cubby hole.
Returns:
the data in the cubby hole. It could be any object, so the getter must cast it to what it thinks is appropriate.
put 
  public synchronized void put(Object data)
This puts data into the cubby hole, wiping out whatever might have already been in the cubby hole, even if it was not retrieved.
Parameters:
data - the object to put into the cubby hole
